sentences.sContent: There are only three canoes so some people will have to swim over.
sentences.sCn: 仅有三条独木舟，所以一部分人得游过去。

sentences.sContent: The wall was crumbling where children had climbed over.
sentences.sCn: 墙上孩子们爬过的地方正在崩坍。

sentences.sContent: I went over (= crossed the room, street etc ) to say hello, but Vincent didn’t recognize me.
sentences.sCn: 我走过去打招呼，但文森特没有认出是我。

sentences.sContent: Come over here and see what I’ve found.
sentences.sCn: 到这里来，看看我找到了什么。

phrases.pCn: 到处，遍及；浑身；全部结束
复习，重温；仔细检查；转变；润色
adv. 一再地；反复不断地
招待某人在家吃饭 (或饮酒等)
在…对面；正对着；与…相反；与…形成对照
煎半熟蛋；煎两面；结束容易

words.tran: 过于老化；商品过剩；人工时效过度

trans.tranOther: from one side of an object, space, or area to the other side
above or higher than something, without touching it
